ModMetaData.name: Harvest Kurin Tails
ModMetaData.author: Espio Idsavant
ModMetaData.description: "This mod adds the ability to harvest and install Kurin tales, from either HAR or Deluxe edition Kurins. Harvested tails can also be processed at a tailoring bench to be turned into kurin fur, a material that can used to craft in place of wool."
